name: VirusesCausingMeningitisTestsForNucleicAcidInCerebrospinalFluid
title: Viruses [Causing Meningitis] (Tests for Nucleic Acid in Cerebrospinal Fluid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with Meningitis-causing Virus in CSF),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Meningitis-causing Virus in CSF),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
